column5: anyone use a weather radio while in Northwest Ontario? Wondering if a portable radio from the states work there.
Same set of Frequencies - no idea on coverage though.
Ours works in the Sioux Narrows area of Lake of the Woods.

If I remember correctly there is a Canadian website with the radio broadcast locations listed and effective range distances. If you are doing a fly in don't hold your breath. US radios should work if you are within range.
